items:
## Key Findings

- 
Google AI Studio interface is completely free to use - no credit card required for designing prompts, testing models, and building endpoints

- 
Access Gemini 3 Pro immediately via Google AI Studio and Vertex AI for Enterprise
 - 
available with rate limits, free of charge in Google AI Studio

- 
Gemini Pro account includes: 2.5 Pro model access, Deep Research, 1M token context window, video generation with Veo 3 Fast

- 
Build tab for quickly building and deploying AI-powered web apps, Generate Media page centralizes Imagen, Veo, Gemini with native image generation

- 
Gemini 3 Pro pricing: $2/million input tokens, $12/million output tokens for prompts 200k tokens or less


## Action Items

- Visit aistudio.google.com and sign in with Google account to access Google AI Studio
- 
Enable Cloud Billing: Open Google AI Studio → Settings → Plan information → Click "Set up Billing" to unlock higher rate limits

- 
Start with Build mode to generate fully functional apps with single prompts, or click "I'm feeling lucky" for AI-generated project ideas


## Sources

- Google AI Studio developer documentation and billing guides
- Google DeepMind Gemini 3 Pro model pages
- Google Developers Blog on AI Studio upgrades
- Recent pricing and feature updates from November-December 2025

## Task Overview
- This is an exploration task to understand Google AI Studio capabilities and Gemini Pro account features, currently scheduled with standard priority and due December 1st

## Current Plan
- 2-hour time allocation for hands-on exploration of Google AI Studio
- Inventory available tools, document capabilities and APIs
- Identify 2-3 potential project ideas leveraging these tools
- Create summary report with findings and recommendations

## Progress & Decisions
- Research has been completed on Google AI Studio
- Key finding: Interface is completely free to use with no credit card required
- Access to Gemini models confirmed for prompt design, testing, and endpoint building
- Task appears ready to move from research phase to hands-on exploration

## Recommendations
- Proceed with logging into Google AI Studio for practical experimentation
- Focus remaining time on identifying specific project opportunities rather than additional research
- Document findings in the planned summary report to complete the task
